name: com.photon.voice2
description:
Note: Contains breaking changes to existing Photon Voice Classic (v1) projects.
Adding Photon Voice to your app is a breeze no matter if it is a multiplayer game or VR/AR/MR app.
Photon Voice 2:
 Works with PUN2 or decoupled from it in order to use it with Photon Realtime, Photon Bolt or standalone
 Improved API and Unity components
 Easier integration with PUN2 (see DemoVoicePun)
 Improved audio quality with echo cancellation, noise suppression, automatic gain control, etc. (see DemoVoiceUI for testing)
 New and updated demos
 PUN2 demos and PhotonChatAPI included 
 attach audio sources to  3D objects in Unity and freely place the audiostreams, e.g. in a virtual world or a FPS
 best possible audio quality due to state-of-the-art Opus codec
 works 100% across different networks, even in mobile networks
 scales automatically in Photon Cloud's global hosting centers in US, Europe, Asia & Australia to any amount of concurrent users you need
 can be used with any multiplayer engine
 list of supported platforms (https://doc.photonengine.com/en-us/voice/current/getting-started/voice-intro#supported_platforms) 
All for FREE including hosting in our Photon Cloud for up to 20 CCU.
For details please read our Photon Voice documentation (https://doc.photonengine.com/en-us/voice/v2/getting-started/voice-for-pun) or visit our product website.
